title: Some logins blocked
content: Since upgrading to 101 I am unable to login to some websites. So far this has happened with two financial institutions. For these I have had to use another browser to login to them. What happens is that I fill in my login credentials and click the login button. The login button appears to be dead as nothing happens. Logging in to all other websites works fine.
creator: bruce103

title: Reinstalling Firefox and linking to an existing account
content:
My desktop computer had a meltdown requiring a new hard drive and re-installation of Firefox. Upon installation I was asked for an authentication code but I have never put the two step process in place.

I'm then asked for a 10 digit number provided when setting up my account. I set my account up multiple years ago and have an alpha numeric code which does not work.

I can still access my account on my laptop - just cant reinstall on my desktop.

OS - Windows 10 - up to date, downloaded yesterday. Same with Firefox.

Suggestions?
creator: karengrogan7
